1.content:

1121112.content:
Alice's whole body started to grow. She kept growing until her body filled up the entire room. Her torso had pushed all of the furniture to the wall. Luckily, the boy hadn't been injured at all. However, her leg was on top of him, keeping him trapped. Though he struggled to get free, her leg was an immovable wall. The boy tried to get her attention, but she was so big, she couldn't hear him at all. Thankfully, she hadn't forgotten about her tiny friend and started to search for him.

"Where are you? If you're still alive, please try to do something that I can notice." Alice said. The boy wasn't sure what to do, so he did the only thing he could think of. He bit her on the leg as hard as he could. He didn't want to hurt her, but he didn't see any other way. Alice felt the boy, but only barely. "Ah, so you're still alive, good. Don't move, I'm going to try and find you." She said. Even though she grew much larger and had been stuck before, she tried to squeeze out somehow. She kept struggling until an entire wall came down. "Oops, well I'm sure I can fix that later." She then cleared away the wreckage and leaned down. She squinted, carefully looking for the boy.

The boy jumped and shrieked. He wasn't sure how much help it would be, but he would do anything to be noticed. After a long time of searching, she finally noticed him. He was really hard to see, but still noticeable. She smiled and lowered a finger for him to jump on. The excited boy grabbed what he could and held on. She lifted him up and grabbed a flat piece of the wall that came from the rabbit's home. She set it down and dropped him right on it. Now, it was easier to see him, making Alice satisfied. Now that her friend was in a safe position, she could give him a nice show.

Alice started by rubbing herself and moaning. The boy stared in awe as she winked at him. She then leaned in and gave her warm breath to him, while pushing her breasts together. She could tell he liked it, making her happy.

She slapped her butt, causing a sound that hurt the boy's ears. He didn't mind though, it was too fun to not watch. Alice rubbed her butt and giggled. "I bet you want a closer look, huh? 11321.content:
"I wonder why everything is so small?" Alice said as she wander around the tiny streets. Not only everything's small, but everything is also very unfamiliar to her such as the skyscrapers for instance. "What is this place and why is there so many strange things like those sliver buildings?" she thought to herself just as she felt her stomach growling; because of her size, it caused a slight rumble that occurred everything around her. "I guess I must be hungry, I wondered if there's something to eat?" she wondered and look around the city for something to eat. She soon spotted a hot dog vendor right below her feet and wondered if it was food. She bent down to pick it up (causing the owner to run off) and see the hot dog icon on the vendor. "So this is called a "hot dog". I wondered what it taste like?" she said as she lift it above her mouth and pour the entire food inside her mouth. "That taste amazing!" she said "I wonder if there's other stuff to eat?" Alice puts down the hot dog vendor and continued on ahead.

Alice soon discovered and eaten many stuff she finds such as ice creams, hamburgers, vegetables, tacos, pizzas, fruits, fishes, some dishes from restraint, and many more. Finally now full, she sat down at the same spot where she first came to this world. "The food around here is amazing!" she said and suddenly she felt her stomach grumbling and let out a loud burp that was loud enough to cause some moderate destruction around the tiny town. "Excuse me everybody!" she said.

15432.content:
Joe ( You ) Found himself Barbie or rather Ken
doll sized in a strange looking ballroom that seemed
familiar somehow.

Joe was drawn out of his thoughts though by
a shocking sight.
A “little” girl maybe 4 or 5 years old towering
over him a fair bit.

She had red hair, blue eyes and was wearing
no shoes but striped knee high socks
and a familiar blue dress with white apron
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/12...

The socks even had the name
“Alice” sewn into them.

The child was too busy talking to herself.
“I dunno where I am but after fallin so much
I’m hungry! I know mommy would scold me
for desert before dinner but these cookies are
all that’s here and the say “EAT ME”

As if on cue her stomach growled.
She seemed to reach a decision as Joe
decided what to do.
Alice wasted no time wolfing down multiple cookies.
Neither Alice nor Joe knew what the effects would be.

info.brief_description:
You are suddenly shrunk near Alice..
Everything is possible now!
info.description:
You are shrunk near the Alice.
She is about 10-13 year old and based on Movie Character from Alice in Wonderland (1999).
She has yellow dress with white pinafore, striped stockings (black and white) and shoes of the 'Mary Jane' style.

You can be any size below 1 ft.(smaller-better).
You cannot grow.
Alice cannot shrink.
Everything can happen now.
Everything allowed-you are restricted with only your fantasy =) .

Please, don't make too short sentences.
